PyTUPS documentation
====================

PyTUPS is a tool built around paleoclimate data.  
It enables interaction with `NOAA Database <https://www.ncei.noaa.gov/access/paleo-search/>`.

In summary, PyTUPS allows you to:

* Search studies through Python  
* Check publications, sites, and datasets related to studies  
* Open dataset files in pandas (currently supports `.txt` files following the NOAA template)
